name: For Hexposure
description:
(Prototype build for our DES310 Project)

 Description 

You are a witch who runs a potion shop called the Fixer Elixir!
You meet with customers every day to hear their needs, then go to your Spell book to find the perfect potion to fix their problem. 

 Controls 

Move - A+D

Jump - W/SPACE

Broomstick - W+S

Pick Up/ Use Item/ Interact - E

Drop Ingredient - Q

Pause Game - ESC

 Gameplay 
  • Serve your customers a potion to suit their needs in a satisfying and fun way.
  • Gather and explore your home to find ingredients for potions and explore the whimsical and cosy home of our Witch.
  • Consult your magic Spell Book to solve Riddle Recipes for your potions.
  • Enjoy the light-hearted humour of the interactions between our Witch and Frodger/Strawby.
 Features 
  • Retro pixel-art graphics!
  • Meet a cast of interesting characters like Frodger and Strawby.
Meet Your Customers Frodger & Strawby : 

Frodger is a very fancy lad who just went vegan and has a talent for singing! Strawby is an anxious  strawberry mage  wishing to become stronger. They visit the Witch's potion shop for help with their problems.
